articles.title: As 2025-26 Bruins exceed expectations, so has their prospect pool in college hockey
articles.description:
James Hagens and Dean Letourneau have combined to score 39 goals so far this season at Boston College.

The post As 2025-26 Bruins exceed expectations, so has their prospect pool in college hockey appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: James Hagens and Dean Letourneau scored 39 goals at Boston College this season.
Boston College's success boosts Bruins' prospect pool ahead of 2025-26 season.
Strong college performance may enhance Bruins' roster options for local fans.

articles.title: Celtics ‘clear pick’ to win the East? One NBA assistant coach reportedly feels that way
articles.description:
"They're already awesome without Jayson [Tatum], and you add him for 20 minutes a game, or more? They're the clear pick to me."

The post Celtics ‘clear pick’ to win the East? One NBA assistant coach reportedly feels that way appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics are viewed as favorites to win the Eastern Conference this season.
NBA assistant coach praises team's performance even without star Jayson Tatum.
Boston residents can expect increased excitement as playoffs approach.
